extendedInfo.description: Looking for Funny Jokes. Jokespedia has more than 13000 categorized Jokes and is growing every day.Become a community member, rate jokes and publish your own jokes. Your jokes will be rated by other community members and you can climb up the leaderboard.This version is a complete re-implementation based on the great user feedback that I get in the last 2 years.Here is a short list of the new Features:- Complete  new UI based on the Look-and-Feel of ICS. - Cleaned Jokes collection- Internet is only needed for the first start to load the jokes. - Every following start only loads new jokes that where published in the meantime if Internet available. The traffic consumption is limited to a minimum.- The application is community driven. You can publish your own jokes and vote jokes.- Inappropriate jokes can be reported- Add jokes to a favorites category- Get Point and and climb up on the leaderboard. 1 Point â Rate Joke, 2 Points â Rate Community Joke, 15 Points â Publish Joke, 30 Points- Your joke gets over 30 ratings and has a score better than 3.0- Jokes are sorted based on rating- Share jokes with Twitter, Mail, SMSâ¦Ads:This application is brought to you totally free with the help of search and ads monetization. I have opted to use this to be able to keep creating more free apps for you. Please note that with this app you will receive a few search points on your device, all are easily deleted or replaced. Thank you for your understanding.Categories: Animal, Bar Room, Blonde, Celebrity, College, Computer, Daily Life, Dirty, Dirty One Liners, Doctor, Knock Knock, Lawyer, Light Bulb, Little Johnny, One Liners, Political, Professionals, Relationships, Sports, Workplace

reviews.title: Funny app!
reviews.comment: Everything\'s good but I wish it would let me get back on the joke I was on. I hate scrolling up to 75 to get to where I left off, other than that LOVE IT! best joke app out there
reviews.author: Xena Winters

reviews.title: Samsung Y
reviews.comment: app seems to work great. Would be better if people posted original jokes instead of repeats from another app. Needs more joke categories and commenting. Maybe even a picture profile where people can also give a description about themselves and have a following option to follow others to view only peoples jokes you find hilarious. And show the date the joke was posted.I\'ll give it 5 stars if all this is done. I post original jokes.
reviews.author: A Google User
